title: Someone Help
body: OK. so my account has been hacked. My password for my game login has been change hence the reason i am writing on this and not to the support staff, i cant login because o said problem, can someone help me out on what i can do please

replies.body:
Hey there,

You'll have to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support, as you're unable to login to your account please create a new account specifically for the purposes of creating this ticket.
